document_description:
This document was prepared by the Federal Executive and sent to the Chamber of Deputies on April 30, 2019. It was approved on June 27 and published on July 12 in the Official Gazette of the Federation. The document aims to achieve social welfare through a viable model of economic development, a new political order and coexistence between the social sectors.

One of the plan's goals is to stimulate the implementation of projects using renewable energy sources.
